attributes.action: recognise (through the law) that child nudity is not the same as child pornography.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Naked children have been used as inspiration for the arts for hundreds of years. Recent child protection laws do not seem to recognise the difference between the naked human form(a beautiful thing) and pornography - thus affecting many previously legal works of art. 

There is a clear difference between nudity and pornography. This difference needs to be legally recognised to protect innocent artists and their works, while keeping actual child pornography outlawed.
